TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 854
TEI.2.document_title: James Whiteside to Stephen F Austin, 09-04-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Whitesides to Austin, September 45 1832. Draft for $100 in cows, calves, and merchandise.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 854

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Whitesides to Austin, September 45 1832. Draft for $100 in cows, calves, and merchandise.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipi de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-04-1832">4th September 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*please pay to *person_mentioned*Samuel Marshall*/person_mentioned* fifty dollars in Cows and Calves thirty eight dollars in the *location_mentioned*Store */location_mentioned*and twelve dollars in Cash and oblige.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*James Whiteside*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Accepted*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd, on the within order seventeen and 38/100 dollars in merchdz of *person_mentioned*J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml. (his X mark) Marshal*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="0-06-1832">Sept. 6, 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Test *person_mentioned*W. W. Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Reed on the within of *person_mentioned*Lewis L. Veeder*/person_mentioned* twenty Dollars and sixty three cents*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml. (his X mark) Marshal*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="09-06-1832">Sept. 6, 1832*/date_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Wm. J. Eaton*/person_mentioned*—Paid in full*/p*
*/div1*
